fleekhq.name: Fleek
fleekhq.content:
Build on the New Internet

Fleek is a Web3 venture production studio, building on the Open Web technologies of the New Internet (DFINITY's Internet Computer, Ethereum, IPFS, Filecoin, and more). Builders of Fleek.co, an Open Web development platform; space.storage, a user controlled file storage, sharing and collaboration platform; and more upcoming releases on top of DFINITY's Internet Computer.

2020029-infrastructure-engineer-p2p-clou.title: Infrastructure Engineer (P2P/Cloud)
2020029-infrastructure-engineer-p2p-clou.description:
Fleek is a Web3 venture production studio. Our lead product Fleek is an Open Web developer platform with everything you need to build sites and apps on the new web and the underlying protocols that power it (Internet Computer, Ethereum, IPFS, Filecoin, and more). From hosting, storage, gateways, domains, databases, and more, Fleek has everything you need to seamlessly build and manage Open Web sites & apps

Besides Fleek, our team forms the Psychedelic collective (https://psychedelic.ooo/) which has also built Plug (https://plugwallet.ooo/) (over 100,000 users), Dank (https://dank.ooo/) which provides cycle-based financial services on the IC, DAB (https://dab.ooo/) a set of Internet Computer registries, and other key infrastructure pieces like Terabethia (https://terabethia.ooo/) on the Internet Computer.

We are now building additional products on top of the Internet Computer and Ethereum, which is why we are looking to expand our team.

We're backed by Coinbase, Protocol Labs, Digital Currency Group and more amazing supporters that believe in the Open Web and our suite of products.

Job Description

We’re looking for an experienced and dedicated Infrastructure Engineer with P2P and Cloud experience to help us build Web3 infrastructure networks focused on peer to peer technologies like libp2p, IPFS, and other blockchain-oriented technologies.

Responsibilities:

  • Help build and monitor a scalable P2P infrastructure network.
  • Design, develop, test and deploy in a fast paced remote team environment
  • Help with customer service, product scoping and architecting solutions as needed

Professional Experience:

  • Professional experience designing, architecting, implementing, and scaling cloud architectures.
  • Experience in monitoring and reporting bandwidth and resources across nodes in a network and optimizing.
  • Professional experience with peer to peer technologies (IPFS is a bonus!).
  • Experience with configuring and scaling web servers.
  • Experience in AWS or other cloud platforms.
  • Experience with backend or systems programming languages like rust, c, Golang, etc.
  • Familiarity with git, code reviews, testing.
  • Familiarity with distributed to systems, scalability and algorithms.
  • Foundation in blockchain, technical design, and architecting multi level solutions
  • Bonuses: CDN, Peer to peer technologies, Blockchain, CRDT, conceptual understanding and working knowledge of TCP/IP, TLS, threat models, and related networking technologies.

Personal Qualities:

  • Exhibit our core cultural values: clear communication, positive energy, continuous learning, and efficient execution
  • Interest in solving complex challenges, questions the status quo, and raises opinions on design choices
  • Collaborative energy and ability to work well in teams
  • Strong work ethic and passion for the Fleek vision

We are now building additional products on top of the Internet Computer and Ethereum, which is why we are looking to expand our team. In the case of this role specifically in the blockchain gaming industry, where we are producing our first two projects with our new gaming studio subsidiary.

Job Description

We are looking for an experienced and talented Senior Front-End Engineer to help us build the Web3 products, platforms, and tools.

Responsibilities

  • Help implement products and features built on bleeding edge technology
  • Design, develop, test and deploy in a fast paced remote team environment
  • Collaborate with other engineers to identify and solve challenging problems.
  • Design features for performance, scale, and security.

Personal Qualities

  • Exhibit our core cultural values: clear communication, positive energy, continuous learning, and efficient execution
  • Interest in solving complex challenges, questions the status quo, and raises opinions on design choices
  • Collaborative energy and ability to work well in teams
  • Strong work ethic and passion for the Fleek vision

Professional Experience

  • Strong knowledge of Javascript (ES6), Typescript and Browser APIs.
  • Professional experience designing, architecting, and implementing engineering solutions in production environments.
  • Solid understanding of modern web application development processes and standard methodologies.
  • Experience with building React components that follow best practices and are performant.
  • Experience with bundlers like webpack, Parcel, etc.
  • Professional experience with technologies such as React, Redux, Graphql, Storybook, JSS, Styled-Components, Lerna, ESlint, Prettier, REST APIs.
  • Deep understanding of the web technology stack (HTTP, cookies, asset loading/caching, etc) and modern web technologies (ES6, HTML5, CSS, etc).

Bonuses

  • Experience building cross browser extensions
  • Peer to peer technologies, Blockchain, CRDT

aave.name: Aave
aave.content:
The Liquidity Protocol

Created in 2016, Aave is an Open Source and Non-Custodial protocol to earn interest on deposits & borrow assets.

1773090-senior-product-designer.title: Senior Product Designer
1773090-senior-product-designer.description:
The Aave Companies are focused on innovation in Web3 and have a thriving, collaborative culture. Valuing expertise and passion, the Aave fam is welcoming, committed to creation, and eager to build great new tech products... and we're hiring!

As a Lead Product Designer, you will ensure all new products and features are valuable for our users, easy to use, and of the highest level of craft and execution. You will be expected to utilize your full range of design skills — product design, interaction design, design thinking and visual design.

The ideal candidate will be detail oriented, with great communication skills and an ability to work in a high stakes situations. They are knowledgable about the Web3 space or curious to learn.

Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience building and shipping applications or software at the level of whole features/products
  • Highly proficient with design tools (Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator, etc.)
  • Highly proficient with interactive prototyping tools (Framer, Webflow, Principle, etc.)
  • Excellence in design craft
  • Visual design skills with proficiency in typography, desktop UI, color, layout, iconography and aesthetic sense and how these elements impact product function
  • Experience leading product direction and strategic thinking while developing product goals, identifying opportunities, and making decisions based on the impact to people and the company
  • Experience presenting work to a broader product team and other leaders, clearly articulating the goals and concepts
  • Excited about working in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment

Preferred Qualifications

  • Experience participating in the complete product development lifecycle of a Web3 product or Fintech product
  • Experience showcasing your design process across multiple projects, that include interaction and visual design artifacts, multiple iterations, and high-fidelity prototypes
  • Experience connecting your work with other cross-product initiatives within the company to drive collaboration

Responsibilities

  • Lead and oversee the user experience of a product from conception to launch in partnership with product managers, engineers, UX writers and/or content strategists
  • Advocate for the user, and drive a holistic UX and product vision
  • Bring multiple stakeholders to the table to understand and solve problems
  • Take broad, conceptual ideas and turn them into useful concepts and prototypes
  • Contribute to strategic decisions around the future direction of the most loved DeFi product in Web3
  • Design flows and experiences that are simple and elegant
  • Define, craft and evolve designs within/for our visual system
  • Proactively solicit and provide feedback in order to continually raise our bar for quality, while also taking on mentorship

About Us: Product Design at Aave

  • Our designers are strategic partners, from planning and product innovation to launch
  • Each of our designers have a broad set of product design skills ranging from product thinking to interaction design, prototyping, user research, design thinking to visual communication
  • We work in close collaboration with product managers, engineers and marketing to build the best DeFi product in Web3
  • We’re equipped with the best design tools in the business, including Figma, Framer, Webflow and Miro

Benefits

  • Flexible working with office based in Central London (W11)
  • Private health care
  • 4 weeks of paid holiday
  • Front seat into position on working with decentralized financial technologies
  • Guaranteed innovation-driven work environment

1940303-engineering-manager.title: Engineering Manager
1940303-engineering-manager.description:
The Aave Companies are focused on innovation in Web3, and have cultivated a thriving, collaborative team environment. Valuing expertise and dedication, the Aave fam is welcoming, passionate, and eager to build great products. We celebrate differences and seek to recruit, develop, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool...and we're hiring!

We are looking for an experienced Engineering Manager to support and grow our engineering team. Focusing primarily on process development and people management, this role will help increase efficiency and productivity across the team, as well as promote career development of individual contributors.

Initially, this role will report to the VP of Engineering

Responsibilities

  • Ensure the engineering team is able to efficiently ship and develop high quality projects at scale.
  • Manage and coordinate individual contributors across the engineering team.
  • Identify friction points and implement solutions to improve potential bottlenecks in the engineering process.
  • Build strong relationships with Product, Design, and other functions; partner with various teams to deliver value to users.
  • Work closely with leadership and executives to share progress across projects.
  • Mentor and onboard new engineers onto the team.

Requirements

  • Proven experience as an Engineering Manager
  • 3+ years of experience as a manager for at least one mid-sized engineering team (including frontend, backend, QA, etc.)
  • Able to make informed decisions that require a quick turnaround
  • Strong interest in DeFi and Web3; experience in the field is a plus.
  • Able to quickly understand and synthesize complex and nuanced technical information into big-picture, actionable insights.
  • BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field.

Benefits

  • Flexible working with office based in Central London (W11) or remote
  • Private health care
  • 5 weeks of paid holiday
  • Front-row seat in the development of a new Web3 future and new job category
  • Innovation-driven work environment

2016561-product-designer-london.title: Product Designer (London)
2016561-product-designer-london.description:
The Aave Companies are focused on innovation in Web3 and have cultivated a thriving, collaborative culture. Valuing expertise and dedication, the Aave fam is welcoming, passionate, and eager to build great products. We celebrate differences and seek to recruit, develop, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool...and we're hiring! We are looking for a Product Designer who will be responsible for the design and development of various products for the Aave Companies. A problem solver with a blend of interaction and visual design, this role will be involved in the design process from brainstorming through implementation. You will work with a team of 8-9 designers across existing and new products and be at the forefront of building industry-defining Web3 applications. The ideal candidate has experience in digital product design and is passionate about the Web3 space. This role will report to the Head of Design.

Job Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with key product stakeholders regularly to define requirements and prioritize key product features.
  • Collaborate with developers, PMs, and marketing to define and design the best possible experience for the user.
  • Communicate design ideas to stakeholders, developers, and PMs through task flow diagrams, user journeys/scenarios, as well as low and high-fidelity wireframes and mockups.
  • Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to appropriate teams.
  • Ability to work with development teams to execute best design solutions within technology constraints.
  • To ensure adherence to design guidelines and best practices across all platforms, it is essential to have experience and knowledge in Visual Design.
  • Work closely with the Development and QA Teams to ensure successful implementation of the specified designs.
  • Conduct user research and evaluate feedback.
  • Determine user needs by conducting user interviews with real users.
  • Create and run ideation workshops in support of new product explorations.
  • Create rapid and iterative wireframes for prototyping for various ideas and concepts.
  • Facilitate usability testing and evaluate user feedback to improve the concept or existing products further.
  • Evaluate the user experience design of existing design concepts and on-device prototypes, and communicate design enhancements.
  • Research interaction design trends.

  • Research technology trends.

  • Operating prototyping, wireframing as well as designing the whole process end-toend.

Requirements

  • Proficiency with User Experience (UX) processes.
  • Interaction and User Interface Design (UI).
  • Strong Visual Design skills. Understanding of Front-end development is a plus.
  • Understanding of digital platform usability principles with a portfolio of projects to demonstrate it.
  • Solid written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present a strong rationale for design decisions.
  • Excellent time management and organizational skills.
  • Accuracy and attention to detail. An understanding of the latest design trends.
  • Experience working in an Agile Team (preferably SCRUM) will be advantageous.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive Science, Learning Sciences, Statistics, Psychology, related field, or equivalent practical experience.
  • 6+ years of relevant experience in digital product design.
  • Passionate about crypto and decentralization with a foundational knowledge of crypto products (staking, DeFi, etc.).
  • A positive team-player attitude is a must.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Benefits

  • 25 days paid holiday
  • Private healthcare
  • Private dental care
  • Pension scheme
  • Gym membership in London
  • Lunches/snacks/drinks included in HQ

2016560-senior-product-designer-london.title: Senior Product Designer (London)
2016560-senior-product-designer-london.description:
The Aave Companies are focused on innovation in Web3 and have cultivated a thriving, collaborative culture. Valuing expertise and dedication, the Aave fam is welcoming, passionate, and eager to build great products. We celebrate differences and seek to recruit, develop, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool...and we're hiring! We’re looking for a Senior Product Designer who has shipped several recognized, high quality mobile/web apps (Web2 or Web3), is highly skilled in Figma, has an end-to-end suite of design skills (wireframing, visual design, prototyping, user testing, motion, exposure to FE dev processes – coding skills not required but some experience and an understanding helps), and experience across several successful products/teams in the past. The ideal candidate will have previously built and maintained full design systems used by internal teams, and have a passion and pride for clean, component-driven Figma designs. Ideally, you have already used Web3 apps for a while and have an understanding of Web3 UX constraints, and are passionate about reducing the friction and improving the user experience of those. This role will be working in a team of 8-9 designers across existing and new products and will be at the forefront of industry defining Web3 applications, working with a talented team, equally passionate about their craft, and having fun while doing their best work.

Job Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with key product stakeholders on regular basis to define requirements and prioritize key product features.
  • Collaborate with key project team members, including other designers, product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to deliver end-to-end solutions.
  • Operate prototyping, wireframing as well as designing the whole process end-to-end.
  • Portfolio demonstrating extensive experience solving the most complex UX problems and designing thoughtful, innovative web and mobile experiences for large-scale clients.
  • Communicate design ideas to stakeholders, developers, and product managers through task flow diagrams, user journeys/scenarios, as well as low and high-fidelity wireframes and mockups.
  • Create and revise information architecture documents including site maps, user personas, user scenarios, use cases, wireframes, flow diagrams/process maps, and detailed user interface specifications.
  • Present and defend designs and key milestone deliverables to appropriate teams.
  • Ability to work with development teams to execute best design solutions within technology constraints.
  • Ensure adherence to design guidelines and best practices across all platforms with aesthetic appeal and usability.

  • Create and run ideation workshops in support of new product explorations.

  • Lead the design of user interface and information architecture using participatory and iterative design techniques, including observational studies, customer interviews, usability testing, heuristic site evaluations, competitive site analysis, and other forms of requirement discovery.

  • Evaluate the user experience design of existing design concepts as well as ondevice prototypes and communicate design enhancements.

  • Research interaction design & technology trends.

  • Expert in Design Thinking, Agile, and Lean methodologies

  • Deep knowledge about web and mobile UX patterns, best practices, and emerging technologies. A good understanding of modern web development practices is a bonus.

  • Excellent organizational skills, able to switch between tasks across projects seamlessly.

  • Be a leader in user-centered design principles to create experiences that meet user needs and address business goals.

  • Transform ideas, feedback, and business opportunities into reusable, scalable design system patterns and components that meet user needs

  • Champion our design system internally and externally.

Requirements

  • Solid understanding of user-centered design process.
  • Track record of shipping high-quality software/mobile apps/web apps.
  • Understanding of digital platform usability principles with a portfolio of projects to demonstrate it. Solid written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present a strong rationale for design decisions.
  • Excellent time management and organizational skills.
  • Execution with accuracy and precision as well as great attention to detail.
  • Understanding of latest design trends.
  • Experience working in an Agile Team (preferably SCRUM) will be advantageous.
  • Expertise in design and prototyping software (Figma, Sketch, InVision, etc), preferably within Fintech.
  • Understanding front-end development is a plus.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a Design related field.
  • 10+ years of relevant experience in digital product design.
  • Passionate about crypto and decentralization with a foundational knowledge of crypto products (staking, DeFi, etc.).
  • A positive team-player attitude is a must.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Benefits

  • 25 days paid holiday
  • Private healthcare
  • Private dental care
  • Pension scheme
  • Gym membership in London
  • Lunches/snacks/drinks included in HQ

2002667-senior-backend-engineer-new-york.title: Senior Backend Engineer (New York)
2002667-senior-backend-engineer-new-york.description:
The Aave Companies are focused on innovation in Web3, and have cultivated a thriving, collaborative culture. Valuing expertise and passion, the Aave fam is welcoming, passionate, and eager to build great products. We celebrate differences and seek to recruit, develop, and retain the most talented people from a diverse candidate pool...and we're hiring!

We are looking for an experienced Senior Backend Engineer to help build out a groundbreaking FinTech application from the ground up, which will become a critical piece of architecture for the next stage of Web3 and crypto adoption.

The ideal candidate should have a background in the traditional FinTech industry and also be curious about Web3. They are excited to help build a quality foundation, drive key decisions early on, and set up the product for long term success.

This role is remote friendly. For coordination purposes, it is preferred that you are located and working within the GMT-PST time zones.

  • Work with external stakeholders in the FinTech industry to integrate solutions
  • Coordinate with core stakeholders in Product, Legal, and Compliance to build features for scale and performance
  • Become a subject matter expert in payments and Web3
  • Collaborate with front end and smart contract developers

Requirements

  • 2+ years of experience in Typescript and Node
  • 2+ years of experience building scalable solutions on top of AWS or GCP infrastructure
  • Experience building FinTech products
  • Experience working with container technologies like Docker
  • Familiarity with Kubernetes
  • Familiarity with GraphQL APIs and frameworks (e.g., Apollo Server)
  • Experience with database development with both relational databases and NoSQL databases, like PostgreSQL, Redis, DynamoDB, or similar
  • English language fluency
  • Experience working in Web3 or an eagerness to learn
  • Excellent work ethic with the ability to work quickly, efficiently, and to multitask
  • Desire and ability to innovate and improve upon current processes
  • Positive attitude and a team player

Benefits

  • Private health care
  • Dental cover
  • Pension
  • 25 days paid holiday
  • Front-row seat in the development of a new Web3 future and new job category
  • Innovation-driven work environment

aztec-network.name: Aztec
aztec-network.content:
Ethereum Layer 2 with Privacy at its Core

With DeFi networks exploding and fast-maturing, we’re building the Layer 2 network for next-gen payments on this base of new-world capital, building cryptosystems to serve millions of unbanked people around the world. We’re the force behind PLONK— the dominant standard in zkSNARK cryptography invented by our Chief Scientist and CTO in August 2019. Our proving system sits at the heart of Halo 2, the upcoming Zcash upgrade, as and other scaling / privacy networks. Now, our world-class team is hiring for two senior engineers to scale our protocol, so we can take the fight to traditional payments networks. We’re a team of 8, based in London but happy to hire globally — in fact one member of the team is based in Poland, and another lives in India. We’ve built scalable privacy in 2020 — our 2021 milestones are: + Improving native DeFi support in Aztec + Implementing biometric verification proofs + Increasing our throughput to match the traditional card networks

1276737-software-engineer-language-desig.title: Software Engineer/Language Designer
1276737-software-engineer-language-desig.description:
Software Engineer/Language Designer

Aztec uses bleeding-edge cryptography to enable private, programmable transactions on top of the Ethereum blockchain protocol.

Our in-house zk-snark protocol, plonk, is rapidly converging to become an industry standard, used by many companies and projects in the blockchain space.

One of our flagship projects is Noir, an open-source zk-snark programming language. Noir exposes a high-level rust-like programming language, that compiles into a zero-knowledge circuit using our plonk backend software. We plan on supporting multiple cryptographic backends in the future.

zk-snark programming languages present some unique challenges, due to the constraints of compiling a high-level program into a cryptographic protocol.

The Role

We are looking for a software engineer with experience in high-level language architectures and compiler design.

You will be working with Noir's lead designer Kevaundray Wedderburn to develop the language and enhance its features.

Noir is written in rust, which will be the core language you will be working with as part of our team.

Our cryptography backend, barretenberg, is written in C++. Knowledge of C++ would also be helpful as part of interfacing Noir's frontend with barretenberg.

Your role will focus on helping us with the following projects:

  • Further develop and refine the semantics of Noir
  • Develop debugging tools for Noir
  • Writing documentation and specifications for Noir

The latest version of Noir can be found at https://github.com/noir-lang/noir
Our cryptography backend can be found at https://github.com/AztecProtocol/aztec-2-bug-bounty/tree/master/barretenberg

What background should you have?

  • 2+ years experience with at least one low-level programming language, ideally rust
  • 1+ years experience with developing programming language backends and/or frontends
  • Strong focus on code quality and simplicity
  • Some experience implementing cryptographic protocols is preferrable but not required

Few of these are hard requirements - but what we certainly want is:

  • A drive to learn and willingness to dive into the weeds of highly complex code

What's the Offer?

Highly competitive compensation package (including equity)

  • Remote working friendly
  • 25 days holiday + bank holidays
  • Opportunity to work with Aztec's world-class cryptography and engineering teams
  • Work at the cutting edge of blockchain and cryptography

1801755-senior-solidity-engineer-at-azte.title: Senior Solidity Engineer at Aztec
1801755-senior-solidity-engineer-at-azte.description:
Aztec is creating the next generation of payment infrastructure in order to build a fair and open financial ecosystem for everyone. To achieve our mission, we are scaling existing blockchains such as Ethereum to 100's of millions of users. Aztec was founded in 2017 after graduating from the Entrepreneur First accelerator.

Our team is built up of world class engineers, cryptographers and PHD that have worked at Zcash, Betfair, Triptease, TripNotice and Google. The company has just secured its Series A funding and is growing quickly. from 13 to 25 people over the next year. Our investors include Consensys, a_capital, Libertus and major US VC's yet to be announced.

We are seeking engineers, developers and designers who want to work at the cutting edge of cryptography and web technology to join us to help re-invent payments.

About the role:
As a solidity engineer you will be focussed on writing our Rollup smart contracts and bridge contracts to L1 DeFi protocols. Your responsibilities will include:

  • Working with the product team to write L1 smart contracts that integrate new DeFi protocols into the rollup, e.g Uniswap V3, Curve, AAVE etc.
  • Improving the gas efficiency of our verifier and rollup contracts

Requirements:

  • 3 - 8 years of experience writing battle tested Solidity contracts
  • 2+ years of typescript experience
  • Excellent working knowledge of how DeFi protocols work, and best solidity practices
  • A passion for DeFi
  • Demonstrable projects showing clean Solidity code
  • A high degree of focus on code quality and reducing complexity
  • A passion for blockchain, it's potential, and what we're trying to achieve

We offer:

  • 25 days holiday + bank holidays
  • Flexible hours
  • Part remote
  • Equipment
  • Equity

Aztec was founded in 2017 after graduating from the Entrepreneur First accelerator, and we raised our Series A funding in 2021 from Paradigm, Consensys, a_capital, Variant, Scalar and Libertus. Our 25 person team is built up of world class engineers, cryptographers and PhDs who have worked at Zcash, Betfair, Triptease, TripNotice and Google.

About the role: We are looking for someone to grow the team that will build the foundation for a new financial system that is open, permissionless, and fair. In this role, you will identify, source, and hire for critical talent needs.

Your responsibilities will include:

Subject matter expertise in recruiting for engineering talent and interest in recruiting for a diverse set of roles including product, full stack, language designers, and cryptographers
You love learning and are excited to recruit advanced cryptography and web3 experts

balancer-labs-1.name: Balancer Labs
balancer-labs-1.content: Balancer Labs has helped to create Balancer Protocol, a core part of Blockchain's DeFi community. Balancer is an automated market maker, decentralized exchange, and liquidity pool protocol built on Ethereum that allows anyone to create or add liquidity to trading pools while earning customizable trading fees. When users swap tokens, their orders are filled by multiple pools with better pricing and lower slippage.

1826203-director-of-engineering.title: Director of Engineering
1826203-director-of-engineering.description:
Our mission is to help Balancer protocol become the primary source of liquidity in DeFi.

Balancer is a DeFi protocol, so decentralization of all its aspects, including data provisioning, is a priority. Data that would traditionally be stored in a centralized database has to be made available on decentralized infrastructure like The Graph and IPFS for anyone to access. While decentralization is our north star, we understand there will be times where more traditional data pipeline architectures are a better fit (eg. for performance reasons, proof of concepts, non-critical use cases etc.).

About the Role
The Director of Engineering oversees staffing of the engineering team including staff augmentation, contractor population management, allocating team members to projects, and hiring and onboarding of contractors and vendors. The Director of Engineering is an employee of Balancer Services and oversees all aspects of Balancer Services technology.

This role and Balancer are fully remote. We see the value in in-person connection and collaboration and will plan team events throughout the year.

About You
Some of the specific characteristics we look for include:

  • A people-first approach to leadership.
  • A strong technical background.
  • Experience managing teams of engineers and managers or leading teams of independent contractors.
  • Excellent communication skills, including the ability to build consensus.
  • Exceptional leadership and project management skills and a passion for developing the skills and talents of others.

Responsibilities
This is a dynamic role, and your day-to-day will vary. Nevertheless, here are some themes that will persist:

  • Manage a team of 10+ engineers located in multiple time zones.
  • Ensure Balancer Services is acting in the best interests of Balancer Labs.
  • Manage staffing and capacity planning of independent contractor population.
  • Oversee contractor engagement, staffing, and performance decisions
  • Approve cost expenditures for contractor and vendor populations
  • Utilize your network to build a recruitment pool of contractors and employees.
  • Promote the continuous improvement of engineering processes.
  • Measure and improve department metrics/goals
  • Create a highly communicative and streamlined process between contractor population and teams they support.

Skills & Qualifications

  • Previous experience building and leading software engineering teams coupled with 8+ years of software engineering experience.
  • Understanding of the talent landscape as an expert at capacity planning, staffing plans, and staff augmentation.
  • Experience identifying and managing global independent contractor populations.
  • Capable and willing to roll up your sleeves to tackle complex technical problems.
  • Have a deep understanding of web technologies and modern web frameworks.
  • Comfortable collaborating with groups outside of engineering and translating high-level business objectives into technical strategy.
  • Experience mentoring and supporting engineering teams, encouraging engineering best practices
  • Have a good understanding of system design, third party integrations, and a breadth of engineering experience that can be applied to design pragmatic solutions.

We are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. If you’re excited about this role, but do not meet 100% of the qualifications listed above, we encourage you to apply.

Balancer Labs is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

2032237-sdk-engineer-javascript-typescri.title: SDK Engineer (JavaScript/TypeScript)
2032237-sdk-engineer-javascript-typescri.description:
Our mission is to be the leading liquidity provider for the world of decentralized finance. We believe that offering a flexible protocol that leverages new models, such as paying passive investors for contributing liquidity will have a profound impact on the blockchain and cryptocurrency space. We're looking for a skillful javascript engineer to join our team. You'll have an opportunity to build a lasting product tha reshapes the global financial system.

Role Context
Balancer is a protocol – represented by the Balancer DAO – that empowers other DAOs to build awesome stuff using our permissionless infrastructure. The SDK team is one of our core and most important teams tasked with making it as easy as possible to build on Balancer. For this reason we are looking for an experienced javascript/typescript engineer who is comfortable building modular class based JS systems. This is a recently established team, your impact will be direct and you will have a great impact on the company’s success.

Responsibilities

  • Design and build the Balancer SDK and example applications to provide a best-in-class experience for devs building on Balancer
  • Develop and own best practices for development with a focus on user experience, reliability, and latency
  • Write stable, high coverage test cases for features you ship
  • Debug issues across multiple levels of the stack

Skills & Qualifications

  • Minimum 2 years of experience with JavaScript / Typescript
  • Experience in developing libraries and SDKs
  • Experience with ethers.js, GraphQL, and Solidity is a plus
  • Self-starter attitude and the ability to execute new ideas with autonomy
  • Passion for working with DeFi projects

We are focused on building a diverse and inclusive workforce. If you’re excited about this role, but do not meet 100% of the qualifications listed above, we encourage you to apply.

Balancer Labs is an equal opportunity employer. We value diversity at our company and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

curve-labs.name: Curve Labs
curve-labs.content:
Applied cybernetics for a distributed global economy

Curve Labs is a team of design and development interventionists architecting distributed solutions for the future economy. We tackle systemic challenges of the Anthropocene by creating, combining, and integrating modular open-source technologies to form organizations more than the sum of their parts.

1917866-tech-lead-web3-blockchain-ethere.title: Tech Lead (Web3, Blockchain, Ethereum)
1917866-tech-lead-web3-blockchain-ethere.description:
About Us

Curve Labs is a team of design and development interventionists architecting distributed solutions for the future economy. We tackle systemic challenges of the Anthropocene by creating, combining, and integrating modular open-source technologies to form organizations more than the sum of their parts.

The Lab, which launched early 2020, is a registered German limited liability company (GmbH) headquartered in Berlin. Our work currently covers three domains:

  • We are a design and development agency that works with organizational web3 primitives to create blockchain-native organizations, a.k.a. “DAOs.” Our clients include an activist coop, a decentralized finance application, and a sustainable development network.
  • We are social activists, creating and advocating for web3 solutions in regenerative finance, data sovereignty, and distributed energy systems. We aim to build holistic cyberphysical systems that simultaneously address social and ecological crises.
  • We are hands-on technologists who create infrastructural web3 building blocks, such as identity and reputation modules, smart wallets, and version control systems. We understand that these primitives are crucial for mass distributed technology adoption.

Altogether, Curve Labs is an exciting and diverse collaborative network of passionate domain experts navigating the razor edge of innovation. Join us.

What we’re looking for

  • 5-7 years of experience, with experience in a technical team lead role
  • You’re experienced in leading remotely-distributed software development teams
  • You have led an entire software development lifecycle of non-trivial public-facing web dApps
  • You have proven experience diagramming and schematizing complex software architectures
  • You are able to mentor a team. You empower personal development, identify and correct knowledge gaps and are able to understand the needs of all developers
  • You understand the connections between Front-End & Back-End and you blend strong leadership, architectural, and product thinking
  • You are a great communicator, able to optimize communications within and between development and other stakeholders in clear and effective English
  • You are able to attract and retain talent
  • You possess in-depth Web3 knowledge (Ethereum, DeFi and DAOs). Your knowledge of the ecosystem enables you to build and coordinate relationships outside of the organization
  • You have a keen awareness of the surrounding business ecosystem, particularly in relation to open-source development tools and technical advancement
  • Your tech stack: Web3-focused, with either back-end languages like Solidity or Rust, or front-end languages and frameworks such as Typescript or Angular. The specific language is less important than a demonstrated mastery of coding, computer science, and/or software engineering principles.

What you’ll do

  • Steer multiple projects together with the project leads and give overall direction to the Front-End & Back-End teams (currently up to 15 individuals).
  • Troubleshoot technical issues that involve software development, engineering tasks and product releases
  • Choose suitable programming languages, frameworks, design patterns, and tools for product development
  • Broadly delegate work and assignments to team members
  • Hire and train technical personnel, proactively mentor and develop the team
  • Transfer technical insights & know-how to the leadership side. Represent and steer company strategy as a leading technical voice
  • Conduct security audits to identify areas of improvement
  • Supervise system modifications
  • Set up, review, and ensure product quality processes, e.g. unit testing, security analysis, and/or code reviews
  • Mitigate technical employee turnover through active listening, representation, and communication

What you’ll get

  • Competitive salary package
  • A leadership team that supports and empowers you to reach your goals
  • You become part of an amazing research and development team that is a core innovator in the blockchain, web3, economics & regenerative finance space
  • A welcoming, inclusive and purpose-led culture in a team that unites around common goals and takes pride in doing the best work of their careers

About dOrg:

Founded in 2019, dOrg is both a freelance digital collective and a DAO. Self-organising teams amalgamate to offer clients such as Badger, Gnosis Safe, and DoinGud a variety of services, from short-term development to longer-term product build. Many of our teams merge fully into client projects for a period of time. At any one time, we’ll have around 60 or 70 builders engaged in client or internal projects. As a DAO, all of our builders (we call our members ‘builders’) are DAO members and have to meet our Criteria for Remaining Active on a quarterly basis. We are constantly trying to balance the needs of a DAO (an active and engaged community) with how busy many of our builders are (with not a huge amount of available time or energy), and are often exploring how we can improve our systems and processes to achieve this balance. This means that we are often in flux, which is both exciting and challenging.

endaoment-3.name: Endaoment
endaoment-3.content:
Endaoment is a new Community Foundation offering charitable Funds on Ethereum

Endaoment is a California Public Benefit Corporation based in San Francisco, federally tax-exempt under Internal Revenue Code section 501(c)(3), serving as the decentralized finance industry’s Community Foundation. It provides Donor-Advised & Community Funds through its web-application, enabling users to donate any major crypto to nearly any U.S. nonprofit. By creating a robust Community Foundation entity for the DeFi industry, Endaoment hopes to encourage the charitable giving of cryptocurrencies and the adoption of cryptocurrency technologies by nonprofit organizations. More information visit app.endaoment.org.

1384640-front-end-developer-react-next-j.title: Front-End Developer (React & Next.js)
1384640-front-end-developer-react-next-j.description:
Endaoment.Tech is the technology development company responsible for the platform powering Endaoment. We’re a venture backed remote-first company, making technology that makes tax-efficient financial accounts using blockchain technology.

Endaoment.org is a new Community Foundation, federally tax-exempt as a 501(c)(3), and serving as the Decentralized Finance industry’s first Philanthropic Institution. Donors gave over $30m in crypto over the last year via Endaoment, granting more than $13m out to hundreds of nonprofits. Donors give crypto directly to charity without having to sell first while grant recipients get dollars wired directly into their traditional bank account (or USDC into their wallet).

As a Front-End Developer, you’ll be responsible for building components and interfaces for Endaoment products. You'd report to the Engineering Project Manager and CEO jointly. We're looking for an experienced junior web developer to continue to build out our entire front end infrastructure and instill good best practices and code hygiene. Successful candidates will have a minimum of three years’ recent experience with all of the skills listed below. Additionally, you’ll be responsible for working together with our external engineering partners as needed.

Current Codebase/Services/Tools Include:

  • React.js & Next.js
  • Typescript
  • Storybook
  • Figma
  • HTML
  • mySQL/prisma
  • Shell
  • Email.js
  • Node.js
  • APIs (REST, RPC)
  • Bonus: Solidity (Ethereum blockchain smart contracts)
  • Bonus: Google Cloud Platform

*What you’ll be working on: *

  • Maintain the front end code repositories for Endaoment
  • Develop/Request front-end infrastructure improvements
  • Support new features and design changes created by Design team
  • Participate in the choices of engineering methodologies, tools and organization
  • Work autonomously inside a high performing team
  • You’re a great fit if you are:
  • Experience using React, Hooks, SCSS and Typescript
  • Strong eye for good design and proper styling across client types
  • Interested in DeFi & financial technology
  • Extra Points for experience using Web3.js and Ethereum wallets as well as smart contracts
  • Active communicator, with good written English and interpersonal skills
  • Extra points if previous experience in working with Blockchain-based applications
  • Extra points if previous experience in deploying enterprise-grade dapps on any major platform

More about Endaoment.org’s Mission and Values:
Our mission is to manage and encourage the charitable giving of cryptocurrencies.

Endaoment aims to serve as the standard-bearing Community Foundation for the decentralized finance community.

Our goal is to reflect the values and vision of this community and center around the following:
INCLUSION - We elevate diverse voices. We are most impactful when our organization and our work include people from varied backgrounds, opinions and perspectives. We are stronger together.
ENGAGEMENT - We create systems that encourage philanthropy as well as heightened involvement between grant recipients and donors. We have the most power when we work closely with one another.
RESPECT - We listen deeply and treat each other with kindness. We ask for and seek to understand the ideas of those both within and outside of our community.
THROUGHPUT - We focus on moving donated dollars from donors to nonprofit organizations with minimal fees and overhead. We aim to align our organizational incentives with those of the DAF holders, allowing us to focus closely on impact.
COLLABORATION - We learn from and with our partners to achieve meaningful impact.
PARTICIPATION - We achieve our strongest impact when we work together to determine best practices surrounding governance and oversight. We are building an organizational model that leverages new ways to collaborate and enhance our collective ability to do good in the world.

1384633-full-stack-blockchain-web3-engin.title: Full-Stack Blockchain/Web3 Engineer
1384633-full-stack-blockchain-web3-engin.description:
Endaoment.org is a first-of-it's-kind Community Foundation, federally tax-exempt as a 501(c)(3), serving as the Decentralized Finance industry’s first Philanthropic Institution. Donors have given more than $4m in donations and over $3m in grants to nonprofits. Donors give tax-deductible crypto directly to charity without selling first, while nonprofits get dollars wired directly into their traditional bank account or crypto wallet.

Endaoment.Tech is the technology development company building the software behind Endaoment.org. We’re a venture-backed, remote-first company making technology that makes tax-efficient financial accounts using blockchain technology.

THE ROLE

As a Full-Stack Systems Engineer, you’ll be responsible for managing both the react-based front-end and mySQL & Express.js back-end of the Endaoment.org application. We are looking for a seasoned engineer to continue to build out and manage our dev infrastructure & processes. Additionally, you’ll be responsible for managing our relationships with external engineering partners/consultants as needed. You will report directly to and work closely with the CEO.

As a new start up, we’re looking for hard working self-starters who make coming to work everyday enjoyable and fun. You’ll be working on a small team of 5-6 people who make up the entirety of Endaoment.tech and Endaoment.org, reporting directly to the CEO.

Current Codebase/Services Include:

  • React.js
  • Typescript/Javascript
  • HTML
  • mySQL
  • Shell
  • Email.js
  • Node.js
  • Infura.io
  • Solidity (Ethereum blockchain smart contracts)
  • Google Cloud Platform
  • APIs (REST, RPC)

What you’ll be working on:

  • Manage the back end of Endaoment.org
  • Develop Request core infrastructure
  • Support front-end applications growth
  • Participate in the choices of engineering methodologies, tools and organization
  • Work autonomously inside a high performing team
  • Working closely with the CEO and COO to manage the SQL database
  • Manage Github repository as well as all submitted issues

You’re a great fit if you have:

  • Solid knowledge of computer science fundamentals: algorithms, data structures, databases, distributed systems, operating systems, networking
  • Strong knowledge of Typescript, React and Redux
  • Understanding of API design & implementation
  • Good understanding of git and continuous integration tools
  • Self-motivated, innovative and proactive
  • Ability to take responsibility for projects and the willingness to learn and grow professionally in a team environment
  • Extra points if you have experience...
  • managing of other engineers
  • working with Blockchain-based applications
  • writing smart contracts
  • deploying enterprise-grade apps on any major platform

1858132-rockstar-marketing-intern.title: Rockstar Marketing Intern
1858132-rockstar-marketing-intern.description:
About Ethereum Push Notification Service (EPNS)

EPNS is building the world’s first open communication layer for the Web3 ecosystem, first for Ethereum and then for L2s and then for other blockchains. The protocol enables any smart contracts, dApps or traditional servers to send notifications tied wallet addresses of a user in a platform agnostic fashion (ie: notifs can be integrated and shown on any crypto wallet, mobile apps, extension or dApps).

The EPNS Journey We have had an awesome journey! Ideation and loads of research were taken to the Ethereum Foundation -> EthGlobal HackMoney 2020 where we built the POC -> selected for IDEO PVD -> selected for Gitcoin Kernel fellowship and came out as a top 20 project! -> entered Gitcoin Grants Round 7 (top 5 project / 210+ contributors) which led us to raise our seed ($1.41M).

We are lucky and grateful to be backed by top VCs / Angels in the space including Balaji Srinivasan, Binance Labs, True Ventures, iOSG, Bixin, BR Capital, TheLAO, MetaCartel VC, Ken (EF), Sandeep Nailwal (Polygon), Scott Moore (Gitcoin), DeFiDad, Mariano Conti, Anthony Sassano, Ravindra (Frontier), Preethi Kasireddy along with 35+ equally awesome folks. You can check out more info at epns.io.

Responsibilities :

  • Collect quantitative and qualitative data from marketing campaigns
  • Perform market analysis and research on competition
  • Support the marketing team in daily administrative tasks
  • Assist in marketing and advertising promotional activities (e.g. social media, direct mail and web)
  • Prepare promotional presentations
  • Help distribute marketing materials
  • Manage and update company database and customer relationship management systems (CRM)
  • Help organize marketing events

Requirements

  • Rockstar spirit to take on new challenges.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills
  • Self-motivated and results-oriented
  • Strong problem-solving abilities
  • Highly developed analytical and organizational skills
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
  • Immediate joining is preferred
  • No prior Knowledge of Crypto or Blockchain is required

The protocol enables any smart contracts, dApps or traditional servers to send notifications tied wallet addresses of a user in a platform agnostic fashion (ie: notifs can be integrated and shown on any crypto wallet, mobile apps, extension or dApps).

*Job Description *

We are looking for a Marketing Analyst who’ll research and identify ways to build our brand and .

Marketing Analyst responsibilities include tracking advertising costs, researching consumer behaviour and exploring market trends and opportunities. To be successful in this role, you should have experience with PPC campaigns and be comfortable with processing and analyzing marketing data.

Ultimately, you will help us ensure we spend our marketing budget efficiently and we target our audience through successful campaigns.

  • Report on marketing KPIs like leads, conversion rates, website traffic and social media engagement and run simulations to benefit marketing efforts

  • Research and implement marketing tools to support our promotional projects (automation software, social media scheduling etc)

  • Expertise in Google Analytics

  • Strong communication and presentation skills

fractional-art.name: Fractional
fractional-art.content:
The leading platform for trustless, decentralized, and community-driven NFT fractions

Fractional is building a permissionless and decentralized NFT Fractionalization platform to enable greater ownership of the world’s most sought after NFTs! We reduce entry costs, increase access, and enable new communities. Working at Fractional you will be building on the cutting edge of NFTs and DeFi to help shape the future of collecting NFTs. You'll get to work, learn, and grow with an experienced team whose gathered strong partnerships and committed investments from influencers, investors, community members, and thought leaders who are deeply passionate about the decentralization ecosystem! Fractional is a remote company with competitive compensation, benefits, and equity.

1911712-backend-engineer-node-js-eu-remo.title: Backend Engineer (Node.js) - EU Remote (UTC+1)
1911712-backend-engineer-node-js-eu-remo.description:
Salary Range:
$55k - $120k USD + equity

NOTE: Actual offer will vary based on applicant location / cost of living, skillsets, and level of relevant experience

About the company:

Time zones:
Eastern (UTC -05:00) and Central European UTC (+1:00)

Fractional provides ownership of the world’s most sought after NFTs! Working at Fractional, you will be building on the cutting edge of NFTs and DeFi to help shape the future of collecting NFTs.
You will get to work, learn and grow with an experienced team supported by incredible partnerships and committed investments from developers, collectors, investors, and thought leaders who are deeply passionate about the decentralization ecosystem.

More practically, Fractional is a decentralized, permission-less protocol where NFT owners can mint tokenized fractional ownership of their NFTs. These tokens then function as normal ERC20 tokens and the owners can distribute them however they would like. You can read more from our medium posts here: https://medium.com/fractional-art

About the role:

We are looking for an exceptional backend engineer to join our team and work closely with our CTO and web stack developers to build a scalable backend infrastructure including database schema decisions and API development as we build our product foundation for rapid growth and continued innovation in this exciting space! Experience with blockchain, NFTs, and DeFi is preferred.

Building layer 2 scaling integrations, such as support for Polygon, Optimism, and Arbitrum

Bridging support for other networks non-EVM (e.g., Flow/Cadence, Solana/Rust)

  • Well versed in understanding all typical attack vectors

More practically, Fractional is a decentralized, permission-less protocol where NFT owners can mint tokenized fractional ownership of their NFTs. These tokens then function as normal ERC20 tokens and the owners can distribute them however they would like. You can read more from our medium posts here: https://medium.com/fractional-art

About the role:

We are looking for an exceptional data engineer to join our team. They will work closely with our CTO and web stack team to build our databases with an anticipation of future data needs, identify where to find that data, and build scalable backend infrastructure. The role will be expected to aggregates data from different sources and blockchains using their skillsets which should include designing database architecture, data structure, ETL processes, API/SDK development, and some backend software development as we build our foundation for rapid growth, future data science initiatives, and continued innovation in this exciting space! Experience with blockchain, NFTs, and DeFi is preferred.

Our Evolving Tech Stack

Front End: HTML, CSS, JS, Vue.js

Back End: Redis, MySQL, Node.js

Infrastructure: DigitalOcean, AWS (S3), Cloudfront

Automated testing: ~under construction~

Web3: Solidity/Ethereum

Integrations: browser-based crypto wallets such as MetaMask, APIs

What to expect

  • Make a HUGE impact helping to bring ideas to reality
  • An entry-point to learn highly valuable, and complex concepts related to art, finance, and technology in a full-time job in an industry growing exponentially, on a team with some of the leading NFT influencers
  • Become a core member of a very passionate team in a friendly environment
  • Work within a dynamic team, who challenges the status quo and champions agile working plus continuous improvement

In this role you will be expected to...

  • Work with our development team to continually release technical enhancements
  • Be responsible for identifying and anticipating our data needs and optimizing our backend software infrastructure, setting data priorities, and building a scalable foundation for our fast evolving site fractional.art
  • Own the data lifecycle (from ingest and automated quality checks, to discovery and usage, and database setup)
  • Build custom integrations between cloud-based or blockchain-based systems using APIs
  • Design efficient data structures, database schemas and ETL for long-term sustainability
  • Ship high-quality, well-tested, secure, and maintainable code
  • Write server scripts and APIs
  • Routinely inspect server code for speed optimization and practical trade-offs
  • Build a scalable NFT metadata backend infrastructure for Fractional.art
  • Incorporate data processing and workflow management tools into pipeline design (AWS etc.)
  • Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines and backend services for real-time decisioning, reporting, data collection, and related features / functions
  • Drive strategic technology decisions related to the appropriate data stores for the job (e.g., warehouses etc.)
  • (Long-term) Architect, build, and launch new data models that provide intuitive analytics to the team
  • Wrangle large-scale data sets from the blockchain and other site APIs (e.g., OpenSea)
  • Build data expertise and own data quality for the pipelines you create
  • Our fast-paced, agile development environment will require a penchant for task management and respect for efficient, best practice development principles as well!

What we’re looking for

  • 3 or more years of relevant software experience in a data or backend-focused role
  • Strong experience with three or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, Node.js, Javascript, SQL
  • Experience designing data structures, database schemas and ETL for long-term sustainability from scratch
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Proficiency in the English language, both written and verbal, sufficient for success in a remote and largely asynchronous work environment
  • Experience with scalable cloud-based solutions
  • A pro-active and autonomous team player, self-starter with the ability to anticipate future needs
  • Capable of prioritizing multiple project in order to meet goals without management oversight
  • Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams, and product management to understand requirements, describe data priorities and challenges, and technical design needs
  • Excellent writing skills and the ability to drive via influence

Bonus points for

  • BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Science, or a related technical field
  • Previous experience in a start-up environment
  • Previous experience in a data strategy / data researcher role
  • Previous experience in a highly scaled, major tech company
  • Experience working with and building structures to extract, transform, and load blockchain transaction data
  • Understanding of various DeFi and NFT platforms

What we're offering

  • Competitive salary (and equity) in an exciting space driving disruptive innovation
  • The opportunity to accelerate our growing organization
  • A remote work environment with competitive benefits and holidays
  • Crypto native colleagues that want to change the world!
  • 7 additional company holidays, including all-company week-long winter break
  • Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance for US-based employees
  • Agile working environment with flexible working hours and location, career advancement, and competitive compensation package
  • We arrange social activities to help our employees become familiar with each other and our culture

If you’re convinced you are the right fit and you can’t wait to join our team, we look forward to hearing from you!

I am an experienced engineer but I haven’t worked with Web3, crypto, or DeFi before... should I apply?

Yes! This is a new and growing space. If you are passionate about learning new things and excited to dive into a new, expanding field, come grow with us!

Once you've applied, please be patient :) we are still establishing our operations so it may take us up to 1-2 weeks to get back to you!

Experience with blockchain, NFTs, and DeFi is preferred.

In this role you will be expected to...

  • Work with our development team to continually release technical enhancements
  • Be responsible for identifying and anticipating our data needs and optimizing our backend software infrastructure, setting data priorities, and building a scalable foundation for our fast evolving site fractional.art
  • Own the data lifecycle (from ingest and automated quality checks, to discovery and usage, and database setup)
  • Build custom integrations between cloud-based or blockchain-based systems using APIs and other data sources
  • Design efficient data structures, database schemas and ETL for long-term sustainability
  • Ship high-quality, well-tested, secure, and maintainable code
  • Write server scripts and APIs
  • Routinely inspect server code for speed optimization and practical trade-offs
  • Build a scalable NFT metadata backend infrastructure for Fractional.art

  • Design, develop, and optimize data pipelines and backend services for real-time decisioning, reporting, data collection, and related features / functions
  • Drive strategic technology decisions related to the appropriate data stores for the job (e.g., warehouses etc.)
  • (Long-term) Architect, build, and launch new data models that provide intuitive analytics to the team
  • Wrangle large-scale data sets from the blockchain and other site APIs (e.g., OpenSea)
  • Build data expertise and own data quality for the pipelines you create
  • Strong technical and non-technical communication abilities, both verbal and written
  • Our fast-paced, agile development environment will require a penchant for task management and respect for efficient, best practice development principles as well!

What we’re looking for

  • 3 or more years of relevant software experience in a data or backend-focused role
  • Strong experience with three or more of the following languages: Python, Scala, Node.js, Javascript, SQL
  • Experience designing data structures, database schemas and ETL for long-term sustainability from scratch
  • Strong attention to detail
  • Proficiency in the English language, both written and verbal, sufficient for success in a remote and largely asynchronous work environment
  • Experience with scalable cloud-based solutions
  • A pro-active and autonomous team player, self-starter with the ability to anticipate future needs
  • Capable of prioritizing multiple project in order to meet goals without management oversight
  • Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams, and product management to understand requirements, describe data priorities and challenges, and technical design needs
  • Excellent writing skills and the ability to drive via influence

Bonus points for

  • Previous experience in a data strategy / data researcher role
  • Previous experience in a highly scaled, major tech company
  • Experience working with and building structures to extract, transform, and load blockchain transaction data

What we're offering

  • Competitive salary (and equity) in an exciting space driving disruptive innovation
  • The opportunity to accelerate our growing organization
  • A remote work environment with competitive benefits and holidays
  • Crypto native colleagues that want to change the world!
  • 7 additional company holidays, including all-company week-long winter break

gelato-network.name: Gelato Network
gelato-network.content:
Gelato is a protocol to automate smart contract executions on Ethereum

We are building the infrastructure for the next generation of automated dApps on Ethereum. Join our mission to provide Developers with the tools to offer an amazing automated User Experience to their customers while building the future of financial automation.

956851-senior-back-end-engineer.title: Senior Back-End Engineer 🍦
956851-senior-back-end-engineer.description:
Gelato Network is a protocol that automates smart contract executions on Ethereum. We develop an open-source decentralized network of relay nodes that developers can plug into to create amazing automated dApps for their users.

Join our team of 10 and work directly with the founders to build the future of Automation on Ethereum. Enjoy a lot of perks, travel with us to cool events (after Corona), and participate in amazing off-side retreats with the team!

What we offer:

  • One of the strongest tech teams in crypto, working fully remote, with HQ in Zug Switzerland
  • Be part of building the backend of web3 on which some of the most widely used applications such as MakerDAO, Connext, Abracadabra and Quickswap rely on today
  • GEL Token package - Get a share of the networks token and participate in making decisions about how the project should be moving forward
  • Worldclass Investors - We are backed by top class VCs and Angels including Dragonfly, Galaxy Digital, ParaFi, Gnosis, Stani Kulechov and many more!

Responsibilities:

  • Building a scalable a decentralized network of nodes that execute tens of thousands of transactions every day
  • Designing and implementing new features within the product such as threshold signatures schemes, trust minimized off-chain computation, token staking
  • Integrate a variety of different blockchain networks in one client
  • Thinking creatively about attack vectors, possible failures, and disaster scenarios, modeling them in reproducible test environments, and developing fixes
  • Modeling and developing recovery behaviors within our core node software
  • Implementing resilient distributed systems to achieve extremely high reliability in a variety of blockchain environments

Requirements:

  • 4 years experience with either node.js and / or Golang
  • B.S. or higher in computer science, software engineering or related technical field
  • Experience with distributed systems and/or container orchestration
  • You can work with high autonomy
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills

Bonus:

  • Knowledge about the inner workings of the EVM
  • Experience with Solidity
  • Experience in building and running bots that interact with smart contracts on Ethereum
  • Knowledge about Ethereum Client & Mining software

Technologies we use and teach:

  • Node.js
  • Golang
  • Typescript
  • Redis
  • AWS
  • Ethers.js

You can apply below or visit our careers page at https://recruitcrm.io/jobs/Gelato_Network_careers?ref=gelato.network

1897642-growth-hacker-lead-remote.title: Growth Hacker Lead (Remote)
1897642-growth-hacker-lead-remote.description:
Gelato is Web3's premier automation network, enabling developers to automate arbitrary smart contract executions on and across all EVM based compatible blockchains such as Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and many more.

Today, Gelato executes thousands of transactions every day and is used by some of the most widely used decentralized applications in crypto as the underlying infrastructure to automate DeFi, NFT and gaming use cases including limit orders on AMMs, interest compounding or automated petting of NFT pets.

What we offer:

  • A fully remote team with team members in Zug, Paris, New York, Berlin, and many other cool places
  • Join the "Gelato Legendary Member Club" and work directly with the founders
  • Participate in building the infrastructure that aims to become the glue between all crypto networks and power the most promising dapps on Ethereum and beyond
  • Generous Token Package - Get a share of the network's token and be able to participate in the Gelato DAO
  • Chance to participate in shaping the future of web3 by working together with the biggest projects in this space, such as MakerDAO, Connext, Quickswap, etc.
  • Worldclass Investors - We are backed by top class VCs and Angels including Dragonfly, Galaxy Digital, ParaFi, Gnosis, Stani Kulechov and many more!

Responsibilities:

  • You will work alongside the product, content, and biz dev teams to brainstorm, plan, and execute digital campaigns and tactical actions that drive potential customers and projects to our community
  • You will use analytical tools to monitor, track, and measure awareness, engagement, and campaign performance
  • You will increase Gelato's social presence in the blockchain developer community such as Twitter, Telegram, Discord, Reddit, Stack Overflow, etc.
  • You will collaborate with influencers with substantial followings within each vertical to better amplify our key messaging and content

Requirements:

  • 4+ years background in a growth marketing role with hands-on full-cycle growth or performance marketing experience
  • Understanding of the emergent culture and trends
  • Expertise at translating complex ideas into simple, exciting, viral content that people will share
  • Knowledge of growth-hacking tools, such as automation and campaign monitoring platforms
  • Experience with SEO optimization, Google Ads, paid social media ads
  • Excellent communication and copywriting skills
  • Strong analytical and critical thinking skills
  • Basic understanding of design tools, such as Adobe Photoshop and Figma

Bonus points if you can demonstrate:

  • You have a growing social media channel like YouTube, Podcast, or Tiktok
  • You are actively involved with the crypto communities
  • You speak more than one language

Perks:

  • Work very autonomously
  • Generous GEL token package
  • Competitive Salary
  • Work together with one of the best technical teams on Ethereum
  • Build relationships with top blockchain teams which are already Gelato users, including MakerDAO, Instadapp, Zerion, Quickswap and many more
  • Chance to travel the world to go to exciting events and connect with key players in this industry
  • Join amazing in-person offsites all over the world

1897545-technical-content-lead.title: Technical Content Lead
1897545-technical-content-lead.description:
Gelato is Web3's premier automation network, enabling developers to automate arbitrary smart contract executions on and across all EVM based compatible blockchains such as Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon and many more.

Today, Gelato executes thousands of transactions every day and is used by some of the most widely used decentralized applications in crypto as the underlying infrastructure to automate DeFi, NFT and gaming use cases including limit orders on AMMs, interest compounding or automated petting of NFT pets.

What we offer:

  • A fully remote team with team members in Zug, Paris, New York, Berlin, and many other cool places
  • Join the "Gelato Legendary Member Club" and work directly with the founders
  • Participate in building the infrastructure that aims to become the glue between all crypto networks and power the most promising dapps on Ethereum and beyond
  • Generous Token Package - Get a share of the network's token and be able to participate in the Gelato DAO
  • Chance to participate in shaping the future of web3 by working together with the biggest projects in this space, such as MakerDAO, Connext, Quickswap, etc.
  • Worldclass Investors - We are backed by top class VCs and Angels including Dragonfly, Galaxy Digital, ParaFi, Gnosis, Stani Kulechov and many more!

Responsibilities:

  • You will define and execute the content strategy to communicate the benefits of our product offering to the existing and prospective developers across multiple channels, including blog, YouTube, Twitter, Newsletter, Discord, and other editorial and social media channels
  • You will engage directly with developers in our community and other Web3 developer communities to acknowledge their needs and create educational content such as tutorials and guides to help them succeed
  • You will be the one that amplifies our voices in the Web3 developer communities
  • You will work with data to measure the impact and effectiveness of all the content

Requirements:

  • Track record of creating engaging content for the developer audience — you define yourself as a technical content creator
  • Working knowledge of programming languages such as Solidity
  • Excellent written and presentation-based communication skills (native or fluent English speaker)
  • Strong curiosity or understanding of the blockchain landscape (Ethereum, DeFi, etc.)
  • The basic understanding of how SEO works

Bonus points if you can demonstrate:

  • You have a growing social media channel like YouTube, Podcast, or Tiktok
  • You are actively involved with the developer communities
  • Developer marketing experience in the B2B technology space

Perks:

  • Work very autonomously
  • Generous GEL token package
  • Competitive Salary
  • Work together with one of the best technical teams on Ethereum
  • Build relationships with top blockchain teams which are already Gelato users, including MakerDAO, Instadapp, Zerion, Quickswap and many more
  • Chance to travel the world to go to exciting events and connect with key players in this industry
  • Join amazing in-person offsites all over the world

1687904-web3-research-analyst-remote.description:
Gelato Network is a protocol that automates smart contract executions on Ethereum. We develop an open-source system coordinating a decentralized network of relay nodes that developers can plug into to create amazing automated dApps for their users.

Join our team and work directly with the founders to build the future of Automation for the upcoming decentralized web. Enjoy a lot of perks, travel with us to cool events and participate in amazing off-side retreats with the team!

Participate in creating the most sophisticated crypto bot network ever created by designing the smart contracts that will rule them all!

We are a fully remote team and although we hire globally, there is a strong preference for this role to be based in Switzerland or Germany.

Goal:

  • Execute Gelato’s customer acquisition strategy by establishing key relationships with top blockchain teams worldwide.
  • Grow Gelato’s usage, dive deep into the community of Gelato’s partners, and join us on an epic journey through this never sleeping crypto industry!

Responsibilities:

  • Close deals with customers by working together with our marketing and tech team
  • Reach out to a lot of projects and become an engaged member of their community
  • Build and manage key relationships with Gelato’s customers and partners
  • Go to events and represent Gelato

Requirements:

  • Advanced knowledge about projects and new innovations in DeFi / blockchain industry
  • 2+ years experience in sales, partnerships and business development at top B2B technology companies
  • Strong hunter instincts for outbound outreach to find and identify customers
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills, especially interacting with senior developers / CTOs

Perks:

  • Work very autonomously
  • Generous GEL token package
  • Competitive Salary
  • Work together with one of the best technical teams on Ethereum
  • Build relationships with top blockchain teams which are already Gelato users, including MakerDAO, Instadapp, Zerion, Quickswap and many more
  • Chance to travel the world to go to exciting events and connect with key players in this industry
  • Join amazing in-person offsites all over the world

  • BONUS:

  • Past work experience in a top crypto / defi project
