gitcoin.name: Gitcoin
gitcoin.content:
Build and fund digital public goods

Our mission is to build and fund digital public goods. We empower communities of builders to connect and work together to create the future of the open web. Open Internet We represent the spirit of the open web, with P2P communities building open source code, sharing open data, and adopting open governance. Open Source The world runs on open source protocols. On Gitcoin, open source builders earn while working in a culture of collaboration. Open Economies Build open Web3 technologies that support the goals of financial freedom, shared ownership, and collaborative determination.

1864274-gitcoindao-senior-engineer-full-.title: GitcoinDAO: Senior Engineer (Full Stack)
1864274-gitcoindao-senior-engineer-full-.description:
About Us: At Gitcoin, our mission is to build and fund digital public goods. We empower communities of builders to connect and work together to create the future of the open web. As of August 2021, we have helped developers, designers, and creators of all types raise or earn >$35mm to fund their open-source ecosystems by enabling the community and institutions to fund each other with cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, or DAI.

About the Role: We are looking for a Senior Engineer - Full Stack to join us as a full-time contributor in the GitcoinDAO on Decentralize Gitcoin workstream developing the future of our decentralized grants, plugins, and related products. In this role, you will work alongside fellow engineers, designers, and product managers as part of a dedicated product group to create new products, implement new features, and work to improve the performance, quality, and efficiency of our current products. This role includes implementing architecture improvements, writing code for both our Vue/JS/HTML/CSS frontend and Solidity contracts on EVM compatible networks, empathizing with our users and stakeholders, and collaborating to review, test, and deploy code with the rest of our engineering team.

What does it mean to work for a Decentralized Autonomous Organization (DAO)?

  • You can work from anywhere! Our completely distributed team spans 5 continents.
  • Learn and grow with an experienced and talented team that values hard work and continuous improvement
  • Flexible time off (and a culture that takes it)
  • Operationally, it's more like running your own contractor/consultant business
  • Culturally, it's more like working for a non-profit because we are Mission-focused
  • There are elements of self management - power is shared horizontally, and you are your own boss

About You:

  • You are driven to create customer value. You can empathize with customers and our user base to understand their needs.
  • You have a bias towards action. You get things done. When you can't get them done, you communicate why and what you need to get unblocked.
  • You are persistent in the face of roadblocks. You take the initiative to fix issues before being assigned them.
  • You can identify problems/risks in architecture design and devise creative solutions/remediations.
  • You write automated tests and have an appreciation for dependable continuous integration/continuous delivery practices
  • You advocate for and understand how to incrementally refactor code to continually improve a codebase while ensuring that the systems are designed to scale.
  • You agree that a passionate, inclusive, collaborative team of missionaries always outperforms a loose group of individual mercenaries.
  • You have at least 3 years of experience as a software engineer at a tech company or startup.

Our Tech Stack Note: We don't expect candidates have every one of these skills before applying, however we expect them to be an expert in some, well versed in others and open to learning all.

  • Front End: HTML, CSS, JS, Vue, Webpack
  • Infrastructure: Linux, Docker, GCP, Terraform
  • Automated testing: Pytest, Cypress, TravisCI
  • Web3: Solidity, Ethereum, TheGraph, IPFS, cross-chain integrations, browser-based crypto wallets such as MetaMask

We believe that our team’s diversity is a strength. Ensuring our team is made up of people from all different backgrounds will lead to the strongest, most performant teams. We welcome applicants from any and all backgrounds.

I am an experienced engineer but I haven’t worked with Web3, crypto, or DeFi before... should I apply? Yes! This is a new and growing space. If you are passionate about learning new things and excited to dive into a new, expanding field, come grow with us!

1936768-lead-product-designer.title: Lead Product Designer
1936768-lead-product-designer.description:
About Us:

Open source software delivers billions of dollars per year in economic value, but those contributing often aren’t properly incentivized or compensated for their work. At Gitcoin, our mission is to build and fund digital public goods. We empower communities of builders to connect and work together to create the future of the open web. As of January 2022, we have helped developers, designers, and creators of all types raise or earn >$50mm to fund their open-source ecosystems by enabling the community and institutions to fund each other with cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, or DAI.

About Grants:

Gitcoin built one of the first Quadratic Funding (QF) mechanisms implemented in the Ethereum ecosystem. The results of the product speak for itself. It was built in a centralized way which greatly accelerated the ability to iterate, make decisions and focus on impact through experimentation. Today, the centralized platform hosts Grants Rounds quarterly, primarily for the Ethereum community, and nearly a dozen related/reliant ecosystems. With this success as a proofpoint, we are on a mission to build and scale a distributed platform for novel funding mechanisms for the optimal distribution of capital to projects and ecosystems that build public goods.

We have developed a prototype of a protocol that will bring Grants into it’s decentralized future. In 2022 the Grants team will be focused on designing and developing the next generation of Grants user interfaces that will serve to not only continue running our fully hosted grants program, but will enable any ecosystem to self-service the running of their own grants program. We aspire to do for public goods funding what Wordpress did for blogging.

About the Role:

We are looking for a Lead Product Designer to join our team - leading and guiding our product evolution into the decentralized world. This person will work directly with our internal product and engineering teams to ensure we are building products the ecosystem loves in a way that introduces and enforces our web3 ethos.

  • Responsible for owning and leading the entire, end-to-end Product Design process including research, UX, and UI
  • Advocate for the importance of lean and agile methodologies as they pertain to Product Design
  • Collaborate with product and engineering to define and improve the product design process
  • Produce high quality sketches, wireframes, and mockups at various degrees of fidelity, as necessary throughout a lean design process
  • Own and define user testing and user research
  • Utilize both data and intuition to help us be better informed in our decisions
  • Responsible for improving and maintaining the Gitcoin design system and collaborating with engineering to get the system implemented into code
  • Use collaborative technologies like Figma and Miro to visualize ideas and create beautiful, functional interfaces

About You:

  • 8+ years of Product Design experience. Founding designer experience is a plus.
  • You consider yourself a “Player Coach”. Ready to roll up your sleeves where necessary, but able to mentor and lead when the opportunity arises.
  • You agree that a passionate, inclusive, collaborative team of missionaries always outperforms a loose group of individual mercenaries.
  • You have a bias towards action. You get things done. When you can't get them done, you communicate why and what you need to get unblocked.
  • You are persistent in the face of roadblocks. You take the initiative to fix issues.
  • You’re in the pursuit of mastering your design craft and consider yourself well on your way towards the top of your game.
  • You’re comfortable jumping into an unfamiliar space and navigating uncertainty (and a little chaos).
  • You’re committed to goals, sometimes determined by yourself and often determined collaboratively, and flexible on tactics.
  • You enjoy giving voice to the people who use what we build.
  • You have experience working directly with product managers, engineers, and stakeholders to ship working software.
  • You’re able to rapidly build user flows and wireframes in your design tool of choice.
  • You’re comfortable with lean, agile environments.
  • You have an aptitude for training and mentoring other designers.

We believe that our team’s diversity is a strength. Ensuring our team is made up of people from all different backgrounds will lead to the strongest, most performant teams. We welcome applicants from any and all backgrounds.

I am an experienced designer but I haven’t worked with Web3, crypto, or DeFi before... should I apply? Yes! This is a new and growing space. If you are passionate about learning new things and excited to dive into a new, expanding field, come grow with us!

1936762-senior-product-manager-dgrants-p.title: Senior Product Manager (dGrants Protocol)
1936762-senior-product-manager-dgrants-p.description:
About Us:

Open source software delivers billions of dollars per year in economic value, but those contributing often aren’t properly incentivized or compensated for their work. At Gitcoin, our mission is to build and fund digital public goods. We empower communities of builders to connect and work together to create the future of the open web. As of January 2022, we have helped developers, designers, and creators of all types raise or earn >$50mm to fund their open-source ecosystems by enabling the community and institutions to fund each other with cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, or DAI.

About dGrants:

Gitcoin built one of the first Quadratic Funding (QF) mechanisms implemented in the Ethereum ecosystem. The results of the product speak for itself. It was built in a centralized way which greatly accelerated the ability to iterate, make decisions and focus on impact through experimentation. Today, the centralized platform hosts Grants Rounds quarterly, primarily for the Ethereum community, and nearly a dozen related/reliant ecosystems. With this success as a proofpoint, we are on a mission to build and scale a distributed platform for novel funding mechanisms for the optimal distribution of capital to projects and ecosystems that build public goods.

The dGrants protocol is central to Gitcoin’s future and growth and the team is chartered with paving the way to a future where running a grants program is as easy as building a blog on Wordpress. In 2021 the dGrants team successfully built a prototype of the protocol and tested it by running an alpha round followed by a beta test round during Grants Round 13. 2022 is our year for launching a production ready protocol.

About the Role:

We are looking for a Senior Product Manager to join the dGrants team. This person will work directly with our internal team and most importantly, our community, to build a protocol that enables anyone to run a quadratic funding round. We are generators of coordination mechanisms; building and funding digital public goods is just one of the world’s coordination problems.

If you have experience working with teams and communities to build platforms, protocols, or other technical products for developers that support large scale adoption, this is the role for you.

Responsibilities

  • Drive product research to deeply understand what it takes to enable targeted user groups to use the dGrants protocol to run their own quadratic funding round
  • Drive out clarity from ambiguity (opportunity, vision, strategy, roadmap, go-to-market) with an outcome-focused approach
  • Guide and develop a prioritization framework in order to keep development efforts moving in the right direction
  • Work with a globally distributed cross-functional team of engineers, designers, community managers, and more to build solutions that scale to tens of thousands of users.
  • Dig into the technical weeds and have enough architectural understanding to be able to engage in meaningful conversations with the engineering team and stakeholders about trade-offs, break work down for execution, and engage with DAO governance.
  • Advocate for, internally and externally, our products, our vision, our future.
  • Be the voice of, and guiding light for, our community of users - describing and detailing their needs along with the progress they seek to make.

About You:

  • You have a strong interest in web3 or have experience either working with decentralized product architectures or DAO-governed solutions.
  • You have 5+ years of prior product management experience, ideally with some or all of it on a technical, developer-centric product.
  • You have a validated ability to collaborate cross-functionally with distributed teams.
  • You agree that a passionate, inclusive, collaborative team of missionaries always outperforms a loose group of individual mercenaries.
  • You bring experience with both establishing and delivering on product roadmaps. Gitcoin operates a two sided marketplace uniting builders with web3 ecosystems - having done this for a two sided marketplace product is a bonus.
  • You have excellent interpersonal skills which allow you to excel at being an advocate for the product and keeping alignment with multiple stakeholders.
  • You are deeply articulate in your communication, both written and verbally.
  • If you don’t already, you’re ready to live and breathe Ethereum technology and culture, staying up to date with the ecosystem. You will know what differentiates an L2 from an L1, and you understand nuance like Ethereum Scaling roadmap and the scalability trilemna.

livepeer.name: Livepeer
livepeer.content:
Building the world's open video infrastructure

Livepeer is building the world's open video infrastructure. Developers building video streaming applications can use Livepeer's network to encode live streaming video with high reliability, at a fraction of the price of traditional cloud providers. Livepeer enables this by creating an open marketplace for excess GPU computing power to compete to encode video, and settles payments through an Ethereum blockchain based system. Every day the Livepeer team focuses on solving hard problems in video focused software engineering, Ethereum and blockchain based development, P2P networking, and more. Everything we build is open source by default, and we have a remote-first engineering team culture and workflow.

1028231-senior-software-engineer-video-t.title: Senior Software Engineer - Video Transcoding
1028231-senior-software-engineer-video-t.description:
About You

Are you an engineer who loves video processing software like ffmpeg and gstreamer? Are you excited about the challenges of creating a decentralized video infrastructure network? Are you interested in creating open source software that unlocks the massive video processing capabilities of hardware around the world? If so, you should consider joining Livepeer as a senior software engineer.

About Livepeer

Livepeer’s mission is to build the world’s open video infrastructure, enabling instantly scalable, reliable, and affordable video streaming. We are starting by building the best video infrastructure for user generated content (UGC) video applications. Users of Livepeer can access instantly reliable and scalable video infrastructure while saving over 10x in cost compared to existing infrastructure providers.

As a blockchain based protocol which has been live on Ethereum since 2018, Livepeer is one of the first web3 networks to deliver real world value to an existing multi-billion dollar industry. We do this by using our open source, blockchain coordinated, p2p network to enable a worldwide community of hardware operators to run infrastructure for video streaming. In trying times like this, Livepeer provides a unique video solution that helps communities and businesses innovate, adapt, and grow through the power of video.

Livepeer is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We are committed to provide a community and environment for mutual respect, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We believe diversity and inclusion are crucial to our success and seek to recruit/develop from a diverse candidate pool.

About the Role

Livepeer is looking for a seasoned software engineer who is passionate about video processing. You will contribute to Livepeer’s core video transcoding software and work with a team of talented engineers from around the world on problems such as optimizing hardware accelerated transcoding, designing systems to efficiently manage/monitor/distribute transcoding jobs on and across GPUs, and building video processing pipelines next to the transcoding pipelines like video AI and video compositing.

As a member of the Livepeer team, you will work with seasoned entrepreneurs and experienced technologists with deep expertise in video and blockchain, all with the same goal of shifting the paradigm for digital video by changing our assumptions on what’s possible.

Responsibilities

  • Maintain, benchmark, and improve the performance of core video transcoding software.
  • Build and maintain software integrations to support hardware encoders/decoders such as Nvidia NVENC/NVDEC, AMD VCN/VCE and Intel QuickSync.
  • Analyze the computational workloads of current and potential future infrastructure providers on the network to support them in fully utilizing their hardware for transcoding and potentially other computational workloads (i.e. cryptocurrency mining).

Requirements

  • Deep understanding of video processing.
  • Extensive experience working with low level video processing software like the ffmpeg library suite and video codecs such as h264.
  • Familiarity with at least one family of hardware encoders/decoders (i.e. Nvidia NVENC/NVDEC, AMD VCN/VCE, Intel QuickSync).
  • Conceptual understanding of public blockchains such as Ethereum.
  • Likes working on a distributed team and collaborating with others through synchronous and asynchronous communication.
  • Comfortable programming in C and Go.

How to Apply
If you are interested in applying for this position, please send an email containing your Github profile and/or LinkedIn to work@livepeer.org with the subject line: Senior Software Engineer - Video Transcoding.

Interview Process
Here is what to expect during the application process:

  • Initial Conversation (30 mins)
  • First Round Interview (60-90 mins)
  • Second Round Interview (3-4 hours)
  • Reference Checks

Resources to learn more about Livepeer

  • Livepeer Primer
  • Day in the Life of Livepeer team members - Angie Ramirez or Yondon Fu

1857469-web3-developer-evangelist.title: Web3 Developer Evangelist
1857469-web3-developer-evangelist.description:
About You

Are you an engineer or developer relations pro who is passionate about the Web3 technology stack, loves hackathons, giving workshops, mentoring, can’t help but find themselves tweeting, writing explanatory posts, and generally helping builders build?

About the Role

As a growing number of Web2 developers transition to Web3, we are seeking a passionate individual committed to making the Livepeer Ecosystem an incredible home for open source contributors to help build the world's open video infrastructure as a foundational layer of the new decentralized internet.

Responsibilities

  • Lead the growth of Livepeer’s developer ecosystem; identifying and developing strategies for specific developer personas
  • Learn and master Livepeer’s current product lines and identify technical and non-technical opportunities for open source contributors
  • Lead the design and delivery of scalable educational programs to build and onboard a pipeline of open source contributors to Livepeer Network through with learning, mentorship and training opportunities
  • Lead developer content strategy and creation (eg tutorials, workshops, and other learning resources)
  • Partner with other Web3 projects to collaborate on educational onboarding and training opportunities.
  • Provide feedback to the Core Team on user experience, product strategy and opportunities to improve the development experience through product discovery and development opportunities
  • Represent Livepeer at hackathons by being the developer relations lead, giving workshops and presentations as appropriate

Requirements

  • Full stack developer with 6-8 years experience in related operational role;
  • Strong understanding of the Web3 ecosystem including core infrastructure, applications and developer tooling;
  • Experience building web3 products or experience contributing to a web3 community
  • Social developer: Natural and exemplary communicator; someone who can explain technology to different audiences and translate complex topics with empathy into accessible formats both in writing and verbally

Nice to Have

  • Experience managing and mentoring an engineering or product team
  • Cross-chain experience
  • Video-tech experience/interest

About Livepeer

Livepeer’s mission is to build the world’s open video infrastructure, enabling instantly scalable, reliable, and affordable video streaming. We are starting by building the best video infrastructure for user generated content (UGC) video applications. Users of Livepeer can access instantly reliable and scalable video infrastructure while saving over 10x in cost compared to existing infrastructure providers.

As a blockchain based protocol which has been live on Ethereum since 2018, Livepeer is one of the first web3 networks to deliver real world value to an existing multi-billion dollar industry. We do this by using our open source, blockchain coordinated, p2p network to enable a worldwide community of hardware operators to run infrastructure for video streaming. In trying times like this, Livepeer provides a unique video solution that helps communities and businesses innovate, adapt, and grow through the power of video.

Livepeer is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We are committed to provide a community and environment for mutual respect, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We believe diversity and inclusion are crucial to our success and seek to recruit/develop from a diverse candidate pool.

1866573-technical-product-manager-orches.title: Technical Product Manager - Orchestrator Experience
1866573-technical-product-manager-orches.description:
About You

You are excited about the challenge of owning important product features that will help an engaged open-source community succeed. You have a strong interest in mining operations and devops processes, and preferably a technical background. You encourage discussions, help the best idea win, and turn it into a well thought-out plan to help with execution. If you are passionate about cryptocurrency mining operations and developer experience, you should consider the opportunity to join Livepeer as our Technical Product Manager for Orchestrator Experience.

About Livepeer

Livepeer’s mission is to build the world’s open video infrastructure, enabling instantly scalable, reliable, and affordable video streaming. We are starting by building the best video infrastructure for user-generated content (UGC) video applications. Users of Livepeer can access instantly reliable and scalable video infrastructure while saving over 10x in cost compared to existing infrastructure providers.

As a blockchain-based protocol that has been live on Ethereum since 2018, Livepeer is one of the first web3 networks to deliver real-world value to an existing multi-billion dollar industry. We do this by using our open-source, blockchain coordinated, p2p network to enable a worldwide community of hardware operators to run infrastructure for video streaming. In trying times like this, Livepeer provides a unique video solution that helps communities and businesses innovate, adapt, and grow through the power of video.

Livepeer is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We are committed to providing a community and environment for mutual respect, without regard to race, color, religion, sex, pregnancy, national origin, age, physical and mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law. We believe diversity and inclusion are crucial to our success and seek to recruit/develop from a diverse candidate pool.

About the Role

Livepeer is looking for a product manager to own the experience of orchestrators on the Livepeer Network. We are looking for a technical individual with deep experience in cryptocurrency mining operations who can work with our community and internal engineering teams to strengthen the technical basis for a thriving orchestrator economy on the Livepeer Network. This includes working with a diverse set of internal and community stakeholders to identify user needs, scoping out core team- and community-driven product features, working with the engineering team to facilitate planning, organizing product launches, and iterating based on metrics / direct community feedback. This is a role with high leverage and high autonomy, and you will be supported by an experienced team with deep industry knowledge and technical expertise. For the right individual, this is an opportunity to create a truly compelling experience for a unique and engaged community.

Responsibilities

  • You will work with the Livepeer Network core engineering team to spec, prioritize and ship features that empower the orchestrator community and support ecosystem growth
  • You will work with the orchestrator community to facilitate community-driven product initiatives and launches
  • You will own the entire orchestrator experience, from onboarding to infrastructure optimization
  • You will encourage progressive decentralization of the Livepeer Network's creation and develop processes that enable the community to build their own products on top of the network

Ideal Candidate (Must Haves)

  • Experience running a GPU miner, either for a PoW chain or a web3 infrastructure protocol like Livepeer
  • Experience managing a developer product - bonus points if it's a highly-available infrastructure product and double bonus if it's mining-related
  • You're self-motivated and biased toward action / execution
  • Strong written, verbal, and organizational skills
  • Deep knowledge of devops and deployment pipelines
  • Strong understanding of the Web3 ecosystem including core infrastructure, applications and developer tooling

Nice to haves

  • Experience managing or contributing to a web3 community
  • Experience with video technology & hardware
  • Engineering background

Here is what to expect during the interview process:

  • Initial Phone Interview
  • First and Second Round Interview
  • Reference Checks

metamask.content:

1894619-product-designer.title: Product Designer
1894619-product-designer.description:
About ConsenSys

ConsenSys is the leading Ethereum software company. We enable developers, enterprises, and people worldwide to build next-generation applications, launch modern financial infrastructure, and access the decentralized web. Our product suite, composed of Infura, Quorum, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets. Ethereum is the largest programmable blockchain in the world, leading in business adoption, developer community, and DeFi activity. On this trusted, open source foundation, we are building the digital economy of tomorrow. To explore our products and solutions, visit http://consensys.net/.

About Infura

Infura’s development suite provides instant, scalable API access to the Ethereum and IPFS networks. Our world-class infrastructure ensures that developers can reliably scale their decentralized application to meet user demand. It’s powered by a cutting-edge microservice-driven architecture that dynamically scales to support our APIs.

Thousands of developers are actively using Infura every day. The strength, reliability and stability of Infura’s infrastructure service makes the brand an essential pillar of the Ethereum ecosystem and the leading blockchain infrastructure provider.

We’re Hiring

Infura is built by talented and passionate people who care deeply about our mission. Over the months and years ahead, we will take our products in new directions, explore new business opportunities, and continue to iterate on our core product. We’re hiring a senior product designer to help bring these ambitions to life.

As a Product Designer you will:

  • Solve user problems with your product/UX design toolkit and help Infura deliver a scalable, accessible, and delightful experience for developers in the Ethereum ecosystem.
  • Work closely with UX Researchers, Product Owners and Engineering to ensure that the correct solution is designed and that it meets our users' needs.
  • Partake in research/product discovery.
  • Prototype and design at various levels of fidelity to communicate interaction and design ideas effectively
  • Actively give and solicit feedback from other designers to continually raise the bar for quality
  • Balance usability and “don’t make me think” principles with complex data, scalability, and transparency design values, advocating for these as needed.
  • Articulate design decisions, learnings, and solutions to cross-functional team members.

What we ask for:

  • You have solved complex problems with an elegant, shipped product—evidenced in an online portfolio featuring end-to-end product design
  • An iterative and experimental approach to product design that learns from real users and releases often.
  • Willingness to work in the trenches doing everything from greenfield product design, website design, and even marketing materials.
  • Understanding of customer experience and the relationship between brand and product design.
  • You are growth-minded, collaborative, and can enjoy some amount of ambiguity, autonomy, and freedom to experiment
  • A strong portfolio that contains not just final solutions, but the iterative artifacts which demonstrates your thinking, as well as your role within that process

Bonus points:

  • Experience writing accessible and scalable HTML/CSS using TailwindCSS.
  • Experience working inside of ReactJS or basic JS.
  • Ability to facilitate remote design thinking workshops.
  • Active use of decentralized applications and blockchain technology for true insights into the space.

Give it a shot!

We value designers with broad skillsets and experiences. Don’t think you have all the required skills? Don’t fret! Apply because not everyone is the same :)

#LI-CB1
1894619-product-designer.location: San Francisco • London • Brooklyn • Remote • Remote

1802513-senior-product-designer.title: Senior Product Designer
1802513-senior-product-designer.description:
At ConsenSys, we have a vision of a world where data sovereignty and financial well-being is accessible to every person and organization. We believe Ethereum and decentralized protocol technology is a more trustworthy and equitable foundation for how we create and share value across the web. On this trusted, open-source foundation, we can accelerate the world’s transition to a universally accessible network of distributed participants where transparency, security, and freedom are fundamental.

Our product suite, composed of Truffle, Infura, Quorum, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets. As the leading Ethereum software company, ConsenSys enables developers, enterprises, and people worldwide to build next-generation applications, launch modern financial infrastructure, and access the decentralized web. To learn more about ConsenSys, and explore our products and solutions, visit http://consensys.net/.

Why join ConsenSys?

Remote first. You’ll be joining a team based all over the world. Providing the unique opportunity to work with people from across 6 continents.

Equity. We believe in ownership and want everyone to have a stake in our future success; that’s why you’ll receive equity when you join us.

Flexible working arrangements. With our global workforce, we have fine-tuned asynchronous working, which means we have a lot of flexibility in the structure of when we work and how we work together.

Competitive benefits.* We have a comprehensive and competitive benefits package to make sure we’re looking after you and what matters most.

*Continuous learning and opportunities.** We provide ongoing growth and development through on-the-job learning and the ConsenSys Advance Program, which includes full access to Coursera, bespoke and technical learning programs, and ConsenSys Academy, our world-class blockchain and Ethereum program.

Unlimited vacation/holidays. We value downtime to recharge and reset, ensuring everyone at ConsenSys has a work/life balance. In addition, company-wide, we participate in “zero productivity” days to take a break from work, shut down, and sit back and relax.

Recognized in the blockchain and Web3 ecosystem. Working at ConsenSys is a tremendous reference for your career. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that extends across the global crypto ecosystem.

About Customer Success team

The Customer Success team at ConsenSys is focused on exactly that: making our customers successful. We’re looking for people who will step towards a customer who is asking for help and respond with innovative and creative ideas to help them course-correct. If you value constructive customer engagement and want to define the future of Blockchain production operations, we’d love to hear from you.

What you’ll do

  • As a senior product designer, you will lead a collaborative design process from conception to launch: partner with small, global teams of engineers, product managers, and researchers to identify user needs, define product strategy, and create roadmaps.
  • Collaborate with UX Researchers, Product Owners and Engineering to ensure that the correct solution is designed and that it meets our users' needs.
  • Conduct research/product discovery.
  • Prototype and design at various levels of fidelity to communicate interaction and design ideas effectively
  • Actively give and solicit feedback from other designers to continually raise the bar for quality
  • Evangelize design and product thinking methodology
  • Fearlessly take on highly complex problem areas and then publish what you learn

Would be great if you brought this to the role

  • Your experience working as a product designer on agile teams (preferably from the B2C world), will guide you through the design process.
  • Your ability to create product vision and use data and research to provide product direction will allow for a more cohesive and planned experience.
  • Your expertise in complex-problem solving (evidenced in an online portfolio featuring E2E product design) will allow you to create modern UX designs which will delight our users.
  • Your experience in planning and conducting user-research - to improve the understanding of our users’ needs and wants.
  • Your understanding of customer experience and the relationship with marketing and product brand will create better communication with the marketing team.
  • Your communication skills and ability to articulate design decisions will create alignment within the team

Don't meet all the requirements? Don't sweat it. We’re passionate about building a diverse team of humans, and as such, if you think you've got what it takes for our chaotic but fun, remote-friendly, start-up environment—apply anyway. While we have a pretty good idea of what we need, we're ready for you to challenge our thinking on who needs to be in this role.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices, and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found here

1727829-product-designer-metamask-snaps.title: Product Designer (MetaMask Snaps)
1727829-product-designer-metamask-snaps.description:
About MetaMask

We’re building for a future where the internet and world economy empowers people through interactions based on consent, privacy, and free association. Where both communities and individuals flourish. To accomplish that, we’re working hard to make web3 accessible for everyone.

MetaMask is both a crypto wallet and a gateway to the decentralized web. Our tools help people create communities, play video games, access financial services, make payments, invest in assets, protect against economic turmoil, and more. Our browser extension and mobile platforms meet the needs of millions of users and developers across the world.

Originally a humble key manager, today MetaMask serves over 10 million monthly active users as a decentralized application development platform, an aggregator of decentralized cryptocurrency exchanges, and a decentralized identity manager.

About the Role

The next phase of the MetaMask browser extension will bring transformative new features to the web3 ecosystem, while strengthening the flagship features that empower our users today. Developing these new features within our secure plugin framework will be a paradigm shift for wallet users and developers alike.

We are looking for exceptional product designers to help us define the user experience and templating and design systems for these plugins, and to help create a compelling set of plugins to help us showcase what is possible with this new system.

In this role, you will ensure that MetaMask continues to support our mission of democratizing access to the decentralized web.

To apply for this position, you must have:

  • 3+ years of software product design experience
  • Demonstrated interest or experience with blockchain related development and web3 technologies through any of: work experience, hackathons, open source work, personal projects, or similar experiences.
  • Experience with user research and usability testing of your product designs.
  • Experience with agile processes (e.g. Scrum, Kanban), and integrating design within such processes.
  • Experience in roles requiring close collaboration with Design, QA and Engineering.
  • Ability to describe and provide a logical rationale for design decisions in a collaboration with a cross-functional team.
  • Proactive and self-driven to be successful working in a remote environment
  • Are kind, empathetic, and supportive towards the team
  • Timezone: Ideally between PT and ET, if in EU/UK you are able to have ~4 hours overlap with continental US time zones.

Bonus points:

  • You’re a MetaMask user!
  • Great understanding of the Ethereum blockchain and ecosystem.
  • Prior experience designing plugin systems or plugins of any sort.
  • Prior experience with designing templating systems, or designing within such systems.
  • Previous experience designing a product which consumed an internal or third party API.

Role Requirements

As a product designer on this team, you would contribute in the following areas:

  • Produce high quality designs for MetaMask plugins which might span many use cases. You are unlikely to get bored working on one project. Be willing to learn about new use cases and context switch as necessary.
  • Balance the need to answer in-the-moment implementation questions about your designs with the need to work ahead of the team to test prototypes and validate them in advance of implementation.
  • Build a deep understanding of our users and their needs.
  • Work with our design, QA, and engineering teams to build the best possible plugin products with compelling user experiences, while working within a secure execution environment and templated design system.
  • Advise on tradeoffs between customizability and consistency in user experience.

About ConsenSys Software

ConsenSys Software is the leading Ethereum software company. We enable developers, enterprises, and people worldwide to build next-generation applications, launch modern financial infrastructure, and access the decentralized web. Our product suite, composed of Infura, Quorum, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets. Ethereum is the largest programmable blockchain in the world, leading in business adoption, developer community, and DeFi activity. On this trusted, open source foundation, we are building the digital economy of tomorrow.

#LI-HG1

1789845-product-designer.title: Product Designer
1789845-product-designer.description:
About ConsenSys

ConsenSys is the leading Ethereum software company. We enable developers, enterprises, and people worldwide to build next-generation applications, launch modern financial infrastructure, and access the decentralized web. Our product suite, composed of Infura, Quorum, Codefi, MetaMask, and Diligence, serves millions of users, supports billions of blockchain-based queries for our clients, and has handled billions of dollars in digital assets. Ethereum is the largest programmable blockchain in the world, leading in business adoption, developer community, and DeFi activity. On this trusted, open-source foundation, we are building the digital economy of tomorrow. To explore our products and solutions, visit here.

About Codefi

Codefi is at the forefront of the blockchain fintech revolution. It builds, deploys, and runs critical applications across both Enterprise and crypto/DeFi, multiple blockchain verticals (digital assets, payments, workflows, data, staking, Ethereum 2.0), as well as ConsenSys’s other industry-leading products, including MetaMask, Quorum, and Infura. The Codefi team is composed of multiple decentralised product teams across all verticals distributed across Europe and US and working mostly remotely.

About the role

ConsenSys is looking for a Senior Product Designer to help drive new products in the Digital Asset and DeFi space. As a Product Designer, you will be responsible for:

  • Leading a collaborative design process from conception to launch: partner with small, global teams of engineers, product managers, and researchers to identify user needs, define product strategy, and create roadmaps
  • Develop storyboards, prototypes, and high-fidelity visual design to communicate interaction and design ideas effectively
  • Actively give and solicit feedback from other designers to continually raise the bar for quality
  • Evangelize design and product thinking methodology
  • Fearlessly take on highly complex problem areas and then publish what you learn
  • Grow a design team as products mature

What we ask for:

  • You have 2-4 years of experience working as a product designer on agile teams
  • Experience working with product design tools like Figma, Sketch, Whimsical, or similar
  • You have solved complex problems with an elegant, shipped product—evidenced in an online portfolio featuring end-to-end product design
  • You demonstrate product vision and use data and experimentation to provide product direction.
  • While you may not have a branding or marketing background, you understand customer experience and the relationship between brand and product design
  • You’re excellent at articulating design decisions, presenting to clients or stakeholders
  • You’re effective at prototyping at varying levels of fidelity
  • You demonstrate solid leadership skills and an ability to develop strong partnerships with product managers and engineers
  • A strong portfolio that contains not just final solutions, but the iterative artifacts which demonstrates your thinking, as well as your role within that process

Even better if:

  • You’re interested in or have experience with decentralized applications and blockchain
  • You’re interested in or have experience designing for financial applications
  • Willing to travel occasionally to meet global clients or conduct research
  • You have experience at both large organizations and start-ups
  • You can facilitate design thinking workshops
  • You enjoy some amount of ambiguity and freedom to experiment
  • You’ve built or worked with design systems
  • You have experience animating interactions and UI elements
  • You have front-end development experience

Why join ConsenSys?

Here are some of the perks of being part of a unique organization like ConsenSys:

  • One of the most recognized tech companies in the blockchain ecosystem globally. A work experience at ConsenSys is a tremendous reference for your future career. ConsenSys alumni have moved on to become tech entrepreneurs, CEOs, and team leads at tech companies.
  • The forefront of a revolution. We fundamentally believe blockchain is a next generation of technology that can lay the foundation for a more just and equitable society. You can be a part of building the digital economy of tomorrow and radically transforming our society for the better.
  • A dynamic startup environment with deep roots. We are one of the earliest blockchain companies and a leader in the space. You’ll join a network of entrepreneurs and technologists that reaches the edge of our ecosystem.
  • Deep technical challenges. Blockchain technology is just over 10 years old. Ethereum itself is still a toddler. There is much to be done before these platforms can scale to the order of millions or billions of users. We are building the tools, infrastructure and applications l that are pushing the technology forward.
  • Continuous learning and improvements. You’ll be constantly exposed to new concepts, ideas, and frameworks from your peers and as you work on different projects — challenging you to stay at the top of your game.

ConsenSys is an equal opportunity employer. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply. We are committed to ensuring that our technology is made available and accessible to everyone. All employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, genetic information, religion, disability, medical condition, pregnancy, marital status, family status, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.

ConsenSys is aware of fraudulent recruitment practices and we encourage all applicants to review our best practices to protect yourself which can be found here.
